title: Man, You’re My Man - Novel Updates
genre: Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Business Management   Caring Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cute Children   Death of Loved Ones   Early Romance   Family   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Modern Day
author: Zhi Shang Qing Huan   指上清欢
description:
Man, you’re my man, the time we spent together...

His chest seemed to have been burned by the fire. It hurt so much, but it could not compare with the gaze of the man standing in front of him. His eyes was gentle but brought him heartache, so that Pei Yi lost all of his courage and wanted to escape.

“I’m back... Pei Yi.”

Familiar tone and long-lost voice suddenly came into Pei Yi’s ears.

Pei Yi’s eyes turned red in an instant.

Shen Dian.

It’s Shen Dian!

He came back...

Pei Yi was shocked and widened his eyes, staring at the face in disbelief. That face should have faded away in his memory but was indeed clear in his mind at this moment.

He still couldn’t believe it.

Shen Dian was really back and even gracefully showed up in front of him in spite of everything.

His mind went blank and his eyes were blurred.

Until hearing that familiar name again, Pei Yi accepted the truth that Shen Dian was really... back.

“...Haven’t seen you for a long time, Xiaoyi.”

Xiaoyi.

He called him lovingly. Only one person in this world would call him like this.

It was Shen Dian.>
